strengths: Excellent adherence to Anthropic-inspired dark theme with stone color palette
Terracotta accent (#D97757) consistently applied to primary actions
Monospace typography (JetBrains Mono) correctly used for data values, timestamps, and console
Pure black console background creates proper visual hierarchy
Well-structured TypeScript with proper interfaces and type safety
Comprehensive loading states with skeleton loaders that match the design
Responsive grid layout with appropriate breakpoints
CSS custom properties defined for easy theming
Custom scrollbar and range slider styling matches the dark theme
Global focus-visible styles provide keyboard navigation feedback
issues: Console output area lacks aria-live attribute for screen reader announcements (LogConsole.tsx line 110)
Form inputs lack accessible labels - missing htmlFor/id associations (ScrapeForm.tsx)
Range slider lacks ARIA attributes: aria-valuemin, aria-valuemax, aria-valuenow (ScrapeForm.tsx line 128)
Loading skeletons should have aria-busy='true' attribute (page.tsx line 137)
Expandable file items lack aria-expanded state (ResultsViewer.tsx line 119)
Global transition on * selector may affect users who prefer reduced motion (globals.css line 152)
Error handling uses native alert() instead of styled toast notifications
recommendations: Add aria-live='polite' to LogConsole output container for screen reader compatibility
Add htmlFor to labels and id to inputs in ScrapeForm, or use aria-label attributes
Add aria-valuemin={5} aria-valuemax={100} aria-valuenow={maxPosts} to the range slider
Add aria-expanded to file list buttons in ResultsViewer
Consider implementing a toast notification system for error feedback
Add skip-to-content link for keyboard navigation
